storyInfo: The first to find the pole-carrier is Taihe, and after a fierce battle, the pole-carrier prevails and flees. At this moment, Kroos's party arrives on the scene. Miss Ning has a heart-to-heart with Liang Xun.

attributes.content: You haven't seen the innkeep anywhere?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Weird. He's not at any other of the places, too. Did he finally figure to retire and kick back at home?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: If only.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: What's up, Liu, bud? Something got you down?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: I-I'm totally fine.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: —Your ability's—soil and stone Arts?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: For all your martial talent, you're a shameful fool to not apply it for good.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Tying my hands with your sand, cracking my pole—what freak fighting style is that?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Your pole only lightly splitting against me makes it the strange one here. From whence did it come?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I only use ordinary young bamboo poles.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Then my style of engagement must completely lack rigor.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Taihe.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Fine name. Incredible.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: It's lucky I could do battle with someone like you at the very end.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You're a mandarin, aren't you? Tell me, what are you planning, here, with the goblet?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Peace and prosperity in the realm for the ages to come.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Hahah, that's a grand statement!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: But sadly, I still can't give this to you.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You've got nowhere to run.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: So you say.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: —You dare flee?!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The pole-carrier leaps one step backwards.
In ten years scaling the mountains, this is one step among hundreds of thousands.
Free as a kite that breaks from its string, he rises as the wind does.
Hmm. A hidden technique?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You won't catch me in the mountains.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Taihe, tell that boy. The Field of Forgotten Water, at the crest of Qujiang Peak.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Don't forget.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Uncle Taihe...!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You couldn't catch him?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It would be simple if I chased him with full vigor. But...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: He's using the goblet as a threat, forcing Innkeeper Zheng to meet with him.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In the Field of Forgotten Water at the crest, the two will meet, and one must die.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Is there no leeway?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I learned its root in our fight just now. There is none whatsoever.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The Field of Forgotten Water, was it?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We need to seize the opportunity.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We're lucky we didn't clash with that pole-carrier any. Seeing his moves reminds me of the last I ever saw Huai Tianpei ten whole years ago.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I assume you recognize those two there?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I told you how my dad's on secret orders from the royal court. Those two are their officials.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Do you know who they are, exactly?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The giant lunk in the front's a bigshot from the Department of Discipline and Supervision, that's all I know.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I see the picture, then.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm not keen on troubling Rhodes Island any... but it looks like we'll need to borrow their power, after all...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *Sigh* This does put a knot in things, though.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I didn't hear what they were saying, but judging by the direction they hurried away, they're off to the summit.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And I'm appointed to meet Rhodes Island at that very summit. Who ever knew the venue'd turn out quite like this.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So do we ambush them at the summit first?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Let's not. They're all fine fighters. We'd be asking for trouble.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Well, what do we do, then—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —Wait! Quick, hide in here! Don't poke your head out!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The innkeeper?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What's dad doing here...? And...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You look ghastly pale.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Is... Is he carrying his blade there?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: No, it's been so many years... he's never taken it out... he's...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: He's a swordfighter, is he?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: He used to be.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Then it seems he's revived the trend.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's not encouraging.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The closer to the peak, the narrower the road.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Nearly there now.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Is this the final path?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The very last one.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Beyond this village, a small ways west, you'll see a long, long stone stairway.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Past its top is the Field of Forgotten Water.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Well, there's a fine coincidence, meeting you all here.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Very much a happenstance.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What are you two after?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The goblet.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: At the summit?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: There's no point in hiding it now. Yes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And someone unaccounted for has it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Just what in the world is that cup?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: If I told you, would you assist us in taking it back, Ms. Kroos?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There's a lot more to your goals than just 'taking it back.' You obviously want to use it for something.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And my guess is your goal happens to be the same as Mr. Lee's. You're all wanting to find its master.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: So why go to all the trouble?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Are you asking us, Ms. Kroos, or... interrogating us?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm no interrogator, here.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: This goblet was made by the hands of a great offender.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Offender?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The offense wide as the heavens.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Court classified. Don't look into it.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: But you want to use this heaven-wide sinner's work to do something that involves Rhodes Island operators.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: How am I meant to help out if you don't tell me?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: My benefactor is quite right.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Though we may be of different standings, there's never any sense in withholding the details when you entrust affairs to people. The proverb puts it well; another's heart is hard to know. Treat each other with candor to get the matter resolved.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Here I was worried you'd gotten lost.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ahahah. An informed concern, benefactor.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You treat them as your 'operators.'
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We do.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The youth falls silent.
The youngest of the Sui Regulator's Candleholders, he must weigh the pros and cons, and make his choices.
It wouldn't be any startling revelation.
But he doesn't want any slip-ups made here.
A fearsome beast dwells in this goblet. It's only a portion of his consciousness, of course.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Lord Zuo.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I'm within my rights. If any ensuing liability falls on the Sui Regulator, you needn't have mercy, Uncle Taihe. Apply the legal proceedings.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Dwells?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Contemporary feranmutologists are in consensus that, aside from some form of corporealized body, walking in land beyond land, this ancient colossus also has means to dwell within certain objects.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The ancient literary saying, 'the beast walks with the generous earth,' actually gives some pointer as to these creatures' characteristics.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Er, does any old object work?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Weapons are fairly common. Whether it's ancient Sarkaz swords or modern, mass-produced staves, we have precedent.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But as for the concrete principle, we're still not sure.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Same goes for that goblet, then?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Wherever it goes, Waregeists spring up. We can't say we're certain yet, but we have grounds to suspect it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The cup is alive, yet it hasn't come to life. The objects around it are all dead, yet live because of it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's been adrift for a long time. It's by a random chance we were able to determine its location.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So now you're out looking for that offender.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I said, just now, its maker was guilty. But its present master is someone else entirely.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And just who is it?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: A poet.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...My Lord.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The wind is high today. The sun is setting early.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Early, but not so. The time came before I could notice.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: How long has it been since last you climbed a mountain?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: In antique times, the mountain chains of Shangshu were above human might.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Shu's paths try, as climbing atop the heavens.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It's different nowadays.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Yet for what difference tolls, some matters shall remain constant.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Nowhere in the Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks may it be found. Will you still search, my Lord?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I need to.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You would balk at nothing, deceive me, deceive us all for this need?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I need to find it.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Surely you are aware that e'en justified thousandfold, to impinge is still to impinge, and to contravene is still to contravene?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Surely you know that should you err once, not only do you forfeit the future, but you bear the brunt of the guilt?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Surely you understand... I am willing to hear what you say?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I understand that.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It's all the more reason I cannot tell you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Because as I serve as a city magistrate, I account for that single city's safety and life. Be it brick or tile or stove or kitchen, so long as the slightest harm comes to it, it is my failure in duty.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: As those that tower above me disagree, all I may do... is try my hardest.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: When first we met in Shangshu, in my early years, I saw that past your occasional obstinacy, you were principled and upright, of vitality whole. I have been staunch in my trust, that should we work as one, 'twould be no trouble we could not surmount.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Yet in this moment...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: ...I cannot help but be somewhat disappointed.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: These words...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Are they words of warning, from my friend, Miss Ning, to me...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Or a supervisory pressuring, from the Imperial Envoy of Vice-Second Rank, the Assistant Minister of Rites, Ning Ciqiu, upon me?
attributes.name: Liang Xun
